definition: an attack of machine-gun fire or cannon fire from a low flying airplane, attack with machine guns or cannon fire from a low-flying plane
details:
noun
- an attack of machine-gun fire or cannon fire from a low flying airplane
= example: an attack of machine-gun fire or cannon fire from a low flying airplane
verb
- attack with machine guns or cannon fire from a low-flying plane
= example: attack with machine guns or cannon fire from a low-flying plane
